DOC.brief_summary: Aim 1: To determine the incidence of glaucoma in Ghana in subjects previously found to be non-glaucomatous in the Tema Eye Survey. Aim 2: To characterise the progression of glaucoma and the outcomes of subjects diagnosed with glaucoma in the Tema Eye Survey.
DOC.brief_title: Incidence and Progression of Glaucoma in the Tema Eye Survey Cohort
DOC.criteria: glaucomatous and nonglaucomatous patients previously seen in the Tema Eye Survey who are selected and invited to participate patients not previously seen in the Tema Eye Survey
